actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Revised Statutes of the United States to permit any Federal officer of employee to waive the receipt of any portion of his/her compensation.

summary.text: Permits any Federal employee or official to waive the receipt of any portion of compensation which he or she is entitled. States that such waived sums shall not be considered income for Federal income tax purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Revised Statutes of the United States to permit any Federal officer of employee to waive the receipt of any portion of his/her compensation.
